overview:
Prior to co-founding PositiveTALK, Tom was a Senior Vice President and Chief Technology Officer for Ultimate Escapes (formally AMEX: ULEI), the second largest luxury destination club in the world.

Prior to Ultimate Escapes, Tom served as the Chief Information Officer for Reuters Research, a division of Reuters PLC (now Thomson Reuters, NYSE: TRI) formed with the acquisition of Multex.com, Inc. (formally NASDAQ: MLTX). Tom served as Chief Information Officer and Chief Security Officer for Multex.com, a very successful startup company that created the first Internet-based online broker research network, which provided more than 2 million users with online financial information and brokerage research.

Prior to Multex, Tom served as Director of Advanced Systems Development for Automatic Data Processing (NYSE: ADP), designing and building the first Microsoft Windows based market data workstation. Tom received a Bachelor of Science in Business Information Systems and an Associate of Science degree in Computer Technology.
